context_bundle.summary: Feedback Analysis Pattern: Multi-channel collect (surveys, social, support tickets, reviews) -> AI sentiment analysis (positive/negative/neutral + intensity) -> Topic categorization (product, service, pricing, features) -> Priority routing (critical: negative + high-value customer) -> Auto-acknowledge -> Trend dashboards. 50hr->5hr/month analysis. $182K/yr value.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Aggregate all feedback to SharePoint/Dataverse. 2. AI Builder sentiment scoring. 3. Auto-categorize by topic keywords. 4. Route: Critical (negative + key customer) -> immediate alert. 5. Send acknowledgment. 6. Weekly trend report.
common_patterns: Routing: Product issues->PM, Service->CS, Technical->Support, Billing->Finance
Alerting: Sentiment drops 10%+ = immediate exec notification
Reports: Daily critical, Weekly trends, Monthly comprehensive
known_errors: Sarcasm detection is weak - false positives
Social media rate limits on API pulls
Response capacity must match increased visibility
